channel.title: Balamodini Children's Stories in Sanskrit (2015 to 2019)
channel.description: A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/bAlamodinI-05, with description: Sanskrit stories read by Samskrita Bharati volunteers from the Sambhashana Sandesha Sanskrit Magazine (2015-2019)..
channel.itunes:subtitle: Balamodini Children's Stories in Sanskrit (2015 to 2019)
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/bAlamodinI-05, with description: Sanskrit stories read by Samskrita Bharati volunteers from the Sambhashana Sandesha Sanskrit Magazine (2015-2019)..
channel.itunes:author: podcast.bharati@gmail.com
